thought.text:
Excellent! Now the configuration is loading correctly. I can see that:
1. `jobs: 2` - the configuration is being loaded
2. `ignore_paths: [re.compile('^src\\\\gen\\\\.*$|^src/gen/.*$')]` - the ignore-paths is being loaded and compiled into regex patterns

Now let me update my reproduction script to use the proper configuration loading:

action.old_str:
import os
import tempfile
import shutil
from pathlib import Path
from pylint.lint import PyLinter
from pylint.lint.expand_modules import expand_modules
action.new_str:
import os
import tempfile
import shutil
from pathlib import Path
from pylint.lint import PyLinter
from pylint.lint.expand_modules import expand_modules
from pylint.config.config_initialization import _config_initialization
